name: poke-doll
effect: Used in battle : Ends a wild battle. Cannot be used in trainer battles.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Use to flee from any battle with a wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.emerald: Use to flee from any battle with a wild POKéMON.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attractive doll. Use it to flee from any battle with a wild POKéMON.
